footnotes: Haya ni kama maonyo ya walio igawanya Qur'ani wakaifanya ati ni mashairi, na ukohani, na hadithi za kale na mengineyo. Nao wasiiamini juu ya kusimama hoja juu yao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
